title: Pretzels anyone?
content:
This is really bad:  
 [http://www.pretzelfont.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713193022/http:/www.pretzelfont.com/ "http://www.pretzelfont.com/")

Any suggestions for other food-based fonts? How about a green bean sans?
author: londontype

comments.content: Stewf - I guess Cole slaw would be a little low in contrast.
